source.content: Security at Massey Hall say there will be no Prince concert tonight #cbcto

comment.content: @trevorjdunn @CBCToronto Hope I can find the guy I paid $200 a ticket for the 4 I bought from him. Boy is he going to be embarrassed.
@trevorjdunn @CBCToronto So glad I didn't go stand in the cold and rain for nothing.
@trevorjdunn @CBCToronto Sure, that's what they WANT you to think -- until the surprise concert like the Stones at the El Mocambo....
